thread.title_full: Bundle Stars reviewed by idan ben david

author: idan ben david
title: idan ben david
text:
service and design are very good
only thing that i dont like is when i go through the differrent tabs of any bundle and play a trailer.. the trailer keeps playing.. i think it will be better to make the youtube player pause the video when i'm changing to another game in the bundle.
design is also good but i would recommand to try and improve the look of bundle buttons.. because i think that the bright grey tabs under the pictures don't stand out enough from the dark grey background.. maybe change to green or add a white\green frame around the picture and tab.. but this is just my opinion.. hope the info will be helpful to improve the site. keep up the good work. Idan Ben David.
